text:
Hello there!

:mega:I am <https://www.linkedin.com/in/stef-curcio/|Stef>, a Growth Marketer with 5+ years of experience growing startups looking for a new remote position with a SAAS startup as a Head of Marketing/Growth Marketing Lead or CMO/CGO. I am currently based in Italy.

:white_check_mark:At the moment I am working for a SAAS startup (that I am leaving soon) that I have brought from 6-7 to 100+ new  very qualified, active users a month singlehandedly and organically in less than 2 months (<https://docs.google.com/document/d/1QypKgjeGY_tIRU_USwvojsopE1chVTS_R-1ZkbosqGs/edit?usp=sharing|CASE STUDY>).

:white_check_mark:I have a solid success record in the SAAS, E-learning and coaching worlds (I grew startups to 6 and 7 figures starting from scratch). I am after a meaningful experience and awesome co-founders I can learn from.

:white_check_mark:I have a solid background in Coaching, NLP and Spiritual Healing which allows me to manage my team peacefully and productively, making everybody give their best and be fulfilled.

Feel free to DM me should you have any opening that suits my skills and experience.

Here is <https://www.linkedin.com/in/stef-curcio/|my LinkedIn URL>.

Have a great rest of the day!

Stef

text:
Hey, everyone! :wave: I'm Tanaaz, a freelance content writer. I've been writing for 4 years and freelancing for just under a year. I specialize in long-form content writing — more specifically — blogs, whitepapers, and ebooks.

Niches: Technology (AI/ML, IoT, Data Science, Cloud, Cybersecurity) & Health (Biotech, Medtech, Pharma)

My clients include Dataversity, Techfastly, Healthcare Management Resources, St. Paul's Rheumatology, and more.

If you're looking for a content writer in these niches, happy to help out! :slightly_smiling_face: You can Slack me or reach out on <https://www.linkedin.com/in/tanaaz-khan/|LinkedIn>.
